definitions.definition: Beheading ; the act of beheading or decapitating .
examples: If the headsman's axe was sharp and his aim was true, decapitation was a quick and relatively painless form of death .

definitions.definition: The ousting or destruction of the ruling body of a government or other organization .
examples: A decapitation strike carried out by drone killed many of the country's senior generals.

definitions.definition: The unseating of a senior politician .
examples: The decapitation of the Foreign Secretary was a significant publicity coup for the opposition.

main_definition: Beheading ; the act of beheading or decapitating .
secondary_definitions: The ousting or destruction of the ruling body of a government or other organization .
( politics ) The unseating of a senior politician .
